description:
Browse our range of high quality commercial grade bar stools. We have an extensive range of modern, contemporary and classic bar stools for pubs and restaurants. Choose from a wide range of finishes and styles including wooden bar stools, leather bar stools, low stools and metal pedestal & swivel bar stools. We offer stools with:
  • wooden frames with upholstered seat & backrests,
  • wooden frames with wooden seat & backrests,
  • metal frames with upholstered seat & backrests,
  • metal frames with polypropylene or wooden seat & backrests,
  • polypropylene stools,
  • rattan stools,
  • metal stools and
  • office stools. 
All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
